content.text: 1 (16 ounce) package baby carrots, sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (16 ounce) package baby carrots, sliced" )

content.text: 2 medium onions, sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 medium onions, sliced" )

content.text: 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese" )

content.text: 3 tablespoons butter
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "3 tablespoons butter" )

content.text: 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "3 tablespoons all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 1 1/2 cups milk
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 1/2 cups milk" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon salt
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )

content.text: 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon butter
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 tablespoon butter" )

content.text: 1 cup fine dry bread crumbs
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 cup fine dry bread crumbs" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
2) Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm.
3) Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Drain, and spread"@3:20 / AC
		:ppt ( "1/2 the carrots"@21:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "onions"@41:47 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a baking dish"@51:64 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "3/4 cup cheese"@14:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "layer"@30:35 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining carrots"@41:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "onions"@63:69 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-2 "top"@75:78 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "remaining cheese"@84:100 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "melt"@18:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "3 tablespoons butter"@23:43 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "mix in"@48:54 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@55:60 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until smooth"@61:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "stir in"@13:20 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@21:25 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until thickened"@26:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "season"@47:53 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@59:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@68:74 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Pour over the carrots, onions, and cheese in the baking dish.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( "the carrots"@13:24 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "onions"@26:32 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "cheese"@38:44 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the baking dish"@48:63 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs.
9) Sprinkle evenly in the baking dish.
10) Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "20 minutes"@9:19 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "the preheated oven"@23:41 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until bubbly and lightly browned"@46:78 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
